column2: Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
• Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the latest and complete set of drawings
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activities
• All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP.
Record of conformity: Site and Office Inspection
• All materials shall be proven to meet contractual requirements prior to acceptance.
Record of conformity: Datasheet / Material Submission
• Surveyor to confirm location with IFC drawings. Alignment of luminaire positions, shallow seating pots to be checked.
• Prior to commencement of removal, the subcontractor shall ensure that the light has been isolated from power.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
• As required, Core asphalt to depth as per subcontractor ITC for relevant Method.
• Remove blanking plate and clean void.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
• Saw cut pavement to accommodate new light base. Protect edges as required.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
• Ensure correct light is installed in correct position as per the IFC drawings, this ITP and ITC
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
• Ensure gap between new light base and pavement not less than 7mm and not more than 15mm.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
• Seal top of recess around light base with Dowsil 888 in concrete
• Sealant in asphalt as detailed in IFC Drawing
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP / ITC/As-Built Documentation
2.6 - Installation of secondary and Earthing Cable
• Each fitting shall have earthing cable provided
– Earthing to be 6mm2 single core green/yellow PVC cable.
– Twin secondary cable to be 4mm2 each.
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP & Sub-contractor ITC
• Each luminaire / fitting shall be connected to a series isolation transformer in closest SIT duct pit/ junction can.
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP & Sub-contractor ITC
• Each luminaire fitting shall be installed on the appropriate circuit as specified in the construction drawings.
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP / As-Built Documentation
• All existing AGL bases shall be raised, abandoned, removed or replaced as per specification
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP & Sub-contractor ITC
• Accurately survey the location of airfield lighting equipment.
• The survey plan, endorsed by a registered surveyor, must identify the location of all installed equipment in relation to permanent site features and other underground services.
• The survey must also capture all installation details such as the orientation and rotation of visual aids, colour pattern, constructed foundations, etc.
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP & Sub-contractor ITC
• Submission of surveyed luminaire position to superintendent prior to practical completion
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
